sqlMap.select: SELECT bb.content_id,b.book_url_hash,b.book_description, b.book_extended,bb.date,u.book_url,u.book_url_ctr,t.tag_name,g.group_name,t.user_name FROM urls u, bookmark b, (SELECT content_id, date FROM bookmark b, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name =#User# AND b.user_name = f.user_name AND b.group =#groupType# ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT#itemCount# OFFSET#startBook#) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id=t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND u.book_url_hash=b.book_url_hash AND b.content_id=bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC;
